article.bdy:
Technical Remote Viewing (TRV) is a type of remote viewing popularized by retired Army Major Ed Dames1. This method is unique in that the viewer adheres to specific protocols, making the idea attractive to the general public. Advocates of TRV suggest that it allows for information retrieval by anyone to obtain information regarding any person, place, or thing, irrespective of time2.
Theory
It is thought that strict adherence to TRV protocol automatically allows an individual to obtain information from something similar to the collective unconscious.
References
1
2
1. http://www.mindcontrolforums.com/hambone/dame0614.html Transcript: Art Bell Coast to Coast AM Radio Show, 14 June 1996. 2. http://www.firedocs.com/remoteviewing/transcript_ab970130ed.cfm Transcript: Art Bell Coast to Coast AM Radio Show, 30 January 1997.
